name: Monique Parker
what_you_do: Monique Parker amplifies impact through strategic communications and creative direction, specializing in delivering strategic vision and hands-on execution across various organizational needs.
who_you_serve: She serves a diverse clientele, including Fortune 500 companies, rural organizations, newspapers, and micro-businesses, focusing on high-impact sales strategy and marketing communications.
service_provided: consulting, project management, strategic sales initiatives, creative direction
bio: Award-winning economic development professional with a Cisco SmartTalk Award and the New Mexico Governor’s Award for Excellence.
business_focus: Monique Parker amplifies impact through strategic communications and creative direction, specializing in delivering strategic vision and hands-on execution across various organizational needs.
